name: botframework-webchat
description: Embeddable web chat control for the Microsoft Bot Framework

scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:component
scripts.clean:backend: cd packages && cd backend && npm run clean
scripts.clean:component: cd packages && cd component && npm run clean
scripts.watch: npx concurrently --names "backend,component" "npm run watch:backend" "npm run watch:component"
scripts.watch:backend: cd packages && cd backend && npm run watch
scripts.watch:component: cd packages && cd component && npm run watch

author: Microsoft Corporation
